name: Wings of Agony
description:
This game was made for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 2) following the jam's theme of "Death=Progress". It took about a week to make using Unity. Sounds and art made by me unless noted below in the credits below. Sounds made using Bfxr and art made using Pixel Studio. My best time is 00:34, can ya beat me?

Credits

Fonts used: 

  • Mirage Gothic - Main font
  • Tannenberg Fett - Timer font

Music used:

  • Basic Metal 20 by TeknoAXE - Main gameplay music
  • Organ by Ivy Fae - Main menu music

Art assets used:

  • Lunar Battle Pack by MattWalkden - Explosion animations
  • Fire Animation by brullov - Fire animations

Sound assets used:

  • Yelling Sounds by HaelDB - Yelling sounds
  • Gun Sounds by Michel Baradari - Gun sound
